customers_say: Customers find these cooking utensils to be of good quality, durable, and functional, with one customer noting they work well with stainless steel appliances. They look great and are worth the cost, with customers appreciating that they're not made of plastic. The handle length receives mixed feedback, with some customers finding them nice and long while others mention they're too long for stovetop use. One customer reports issues with the spatula bending during use.
